test.name: Plytix_001

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Start Process
kw.doc: Starts a new process on background.
kw.msg: Starting process: cd C:\ProyectosPython\flask\factory_method && python wsgi.py

kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=plytix, url=http://127.0.0.1:5555/, headers={'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'x-api-key': '1111', 'x-api-version': '1'}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: Delete On Session
kw.doc: Sends a DELETE request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: DELETE Request : url=http://127.0.0.1:5555/words/reset path_url=/words/reset headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.25.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'x-api-key': '1111', 'x-api-version': '1', 'Content-Length': '0'} body=None

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Post On Session
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://127.0.0.1:5555/words/ path_url=/words/ headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.25.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'x-api-key': '1111', 'x-api-version': '1', 'Content-Length': '34'} body=b'{"word": "calle", "position": "3"}'

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Get On Session
kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: GET Request : url=http://127.0.0.1:5555/words/ path_url=/words/ headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.25.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'x-api-key': '1111', 'x-api-version': '1'} body=None

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Terminate All Processes
kw.doc: Terminates all still running processes started by this library.

test.doc: Initialize Api server and launch sequence DELETE | POST | GET
